sentence.Network_en: As an investment product, it has the dual characteristics: preservation & appreciation and delusive bubbles.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为投资品, 它具有 保值 增值与虚幻泡沫的双重属性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin delus- 'mocked', from the verb deludere (see delude) + -ive
